power.title: Angelic Harrier
power.fluff: A fiery angel briefly swoops down to catch your enemy with its spear and hurl it to the ground
power.section: Effect:You conjure an angelic harrier in 1 unoccupied square in range. The harrier does not occupy its square and lasts until the end of your current turn.
You make the following attacks, using the harrier's space as the point of origin. These attacks count as Weapon attacks instead of Implement attacks for creatures other than you.
Swoop Attack:Melee1one creatureWisdom vs. Reflex
Hit:2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 3 squares. For each square you slide the target, you also move the harrier 1 square to a space adjacent to the target.
Hurl Attack:Melee1the same targetWisdom vs. Fortitude
Hit:You knock the target prone.

power.title: Astral Terror
power.fluff: Astral energy surges through you, transforming you into a beacon of divine terror that sends your foes reeling
power.section: Attack:Closewave 4each enemy in the waveWisdom vs. Will
Hit:1d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Miss:Push up to half the distance.

power.title: Blades of Astral Fire
power.fluff: Gleaming blades of radiant energy appear and strike your foes, then transform into spectral shield that protect your allies
power.section: Attack:Areaburst 2 within 10each enemy in the burstWisdom vs. Reflex
Hit:2d4 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Effect:Each ally in the burst gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Covenant of Preservation:The bonus equals 2 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Forceful Denunciation
power.fluff: The force of your denunciation is such that it brushes asides your foes
power.section: Attack:Closewave 4each enemy in the blastWisdom vs. Fortitude
Hit:2d4 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Covenant of Preservation:Push up to a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier (minimum 3 squares).
Miss:Push up to half the distance.

power.title: Lightning's Revelation
power.fluff: Lightning splits the air, striking your foes and exposing their frailty
power.section: Attack:Areaburst 1 within 10each creature in the burstWisdom vs. Reflex
Hit:2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Covenant of Wrath:The penalty equals 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -2 penalty).
Miss (Covenant of Wrath):One-half the penalty.

power.title: Scourge of Heaven
power.fluff: Astral blades dart and weave through your foes, visiting onto them heaven's fury
power.section: Attack:Areaburst 1 within 10each enemy in the burstWisdom +2 vs. AC
Hit:2d4 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Covenant of Malediction:The target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. This power gains the Fear keyword.
Covenant of Wrath:Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Effect (Covenant of Preservation):Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Summons of Justice
power.fluff: Justive will be served no matter the cost: you draw from your own vitality to hurl a brilliant ray that compels your enemies to come forward
power.section: Effect:You expend a healing surge to use this power.
Attack:Closeburst 5each enemy in the burstWisdom vs. Will
Hit:2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you pull the target up to 3 squares.
Covenant of Malediction:You also knock the target prone.
Miss:Half damage.

power.title: Thunder of Judgement
power.fluff: Each time you strike your staff on the ground, blasts of thunder rock the air around a foe, leaving them battered and senseless
power.section: Attack:Ranged10one, two, or three creaturesWisdom vs. Fortitude
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, or 2d6 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage if you target only one creature.
The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Covenant of Wrath:You can also push the target up to a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Miss:Thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus if you target only one creature.
